docs.text: Crazy Arms Radio Backend Crazy Arms Radio Backend is a flexible and fully featured Internet radio back-end written from the ground up. It's specifically written after its author built several fully decentralized online radio stations with varied types of scheduling and finding no existing product fit some common needs out of the box.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Glossary of Terms AutoDJ related Audio asset audio files, music or short programming for AutoDJ Playlist a collection of audio assets Rotator a collection of stations IDs, PSAs, etc of the same category Rotator asset a single audio Stop set a "block" of rotators, stations IDs, PSAs, etc which in turn is really just a block one or more rotators.
